item.title: GraphQL Options
item.description: GraphQL Options In this document, a ‘Query’ may refer to a GraphQL query, subscription or mutation. Maximum Query Depth The maximum depth of a generated query. Lenient Maximum Query Depth If enabled, this option prevents invalid queries by allowing additional depth for fields with no leaf types. If disabled, Maximum Query Depth is enforced strictly, even if it means generating an invalid query.

item.title: GraphQL Support Script
item.description: GraphQL Support Script The GraphQL Support script is responsible for two things: Correctly representing the nodes for a GraphQL request in the sites tree (since ZAP 2.10.0). Adding GraphQL support for Active Scan Input Vectors. The following sections will elaborate a little on each of these functionalities.

item.title: GraphQL Variant
item.description: GraphQL Variant The GraphQL variant is responsible for two things: Correctly representing the nodes for a GraphQL request in the sites tree. Allow injecting payloads in GraphQL queries (Active Scan Input Vector support). The following sections will elaborate a little on each of these functionalities. Sites Tree Representation Each unique GraphQL request proxied through ZAP is represented in the sites tree.

item.title: GraphQL Automation Framework Support
item.description: GraphQL Automation Framework Support This add-on supports the Automation Framework. The add-on will import GraphQL schemas using introspection if endpoints are found while spidering. However, specifying an endpoint and (optionally) a schema file or URL is recommended if they are available. Job: graphql The graphql job allows you to import GraphQL schemas locally or from a URL.

item.title: GraphQL Alerts
item.description: GraphQL Alerts The following alerts are raised by the GraphQL add-on. Alert Reference Name Description 50007-1 GraphQL Endpoint Supports Introspection This alert is raised when the spider discovers a GraphQL endpoint that supports introspection. 50007-2 GraphQL Server Implementation Identified This alert is raised when the GraphQL implementation used by the server is identified.
